paper_title.en: Effect of Magnetic Annealing on Magnetic Characteristic of Amorphous Wound Core

description.en: In this paper, in order to make a clear principal cause in increasing iron loss of amorphous wound cores in processing, effects of bending stress on magnetic characteristics of a Fe-based amorphous wound core are clarified. The amorphous magnetic materials have been widely used as a core material of power transformers to reduce iron loss due to their excellent soft magnetic characteristics. However, the amorphous magnetic material has an issue that the building factor (B.F.) is very large in comparison with that of grain-oriented electrical steel sheets. The amorphous transformers usually use a wound core formed by stacking plural amorphous sheets in different lengths. Bending stress is, therefore, generated at each corner of the wound core in processing. Due to this bending stress, the magnetic characteristics of the wound core deteriorate. The deterioration of magnetic characteristics of the wound amorphous core is so large because of the large magnetostriction constant. As a result, the B.F. of this material becomes larger. In order to remove the residual stress, which is generated in the wound core including the bending stress, the amorphous wound core is usually annealed in a magnetic field, which is called 'a magnetic annealing.' In this paper, the effect of the magnetic annealing on the magnetic properties is studied experimentally by evaluating some wound amorphous model cores. As a result, a suitable magnetic annealing condition is clarified and the iron loss of the wound amorphous model core is reduced by 65.7%.

publisher.en: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers Inc.

paper_title.en: Development of a new stator module type vernier motor utilizing amorphous cut core

description.en: This paper presents a new stator module type vernier motor, which is applicable amorphous magnetic material effectively as a stator core material. The iron loss distribution in the stator module structure made of a Fe-based amorphous material is numerically investigated with the finite element method and compared with those made of oriented electrical steel sheets and non-oriented electrical steel sheets in a wound core pattern. The results show that the proposed model is useful to improve significantly efficiency of the vernier motor model.

publisher.en: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers Inc.

paper_title.ja: 無方向性電磁鋼板の磁場中熱処理効果の評価
paper_title.en: Heat Treatment in Magnetic Field for Non-oriented Electrical Steel Sheet

description.en: Heat treatment of non-oriented electrical steel sheets is performed in a magnetic field in order to control microstructure orientation and magnetic characterization. Magnetic field (0.5T-5T) is applied to specimens in a direction parallel to the rolling direction during heat temperature from 1023K to 1123K. Specimens magnetically heat treated, showed anisotropic characterization due to crystallographic orientation under high magnetic exciting condition. Recrystallization texture and orientation of specimens are characterized with X ray pole figure analysis. Magnetic heat treatment is found to enhance the selection of (100) or (110) plate parallel to electrical steel sheet surface.

paper_title.ja: Improvement of Magnetic Properties of Fe-Mn-Si Based Ferromagnetic Shape Memory Ribbons with Heat-treatment under Tensile Stress (特集 The 20th MAGDA Conference in Pacific Asia (MAGDA2011))
paper_title.en: Improvement of Magnetic Properties of Fe-Mn-Si Based Ferromagnetic Shape Memory Ribbons with Heat-treatment under Tensile Stress(<Special Issue>The 20th MAGDA Conference in Pacific Asia (MAGDA2011))

description.ja: This paper presents measured magnetic and shape memory properties of Fe-Mn-Cr-Si-Sm-B ferromagnetic shape memory ribbons depending on tensile stress and temperature. The samples were produced with the melt spinning method in air and the magnetic properties were measured with an open solenoid type measurement system under controlling their temperature and tensile load. The alloys are multi-functional materials, which have both the ferromagnetic property and shape memory property. The magnetic properties of the produced ribbon were improved by shape memory treatment under tensile stress. The measured results show applicability of the produced ribbon in applications for magnetic sensors and actuators.

publication_name.ja: 日本AEM学会誌 = Journal of the Japan Society of Applied Electromagnetics

paper_title.ja: Distributions of Local Vector Magnetic Property in a Three-phase Induction Motor Model Core by Using a Small-sized Vector Hysteresis Sensor (特集 The 20th MAGDA Conference in Pacific Asia (MAGDA2011))
paper_title.en: Distributions of Local Vector Magnetic Property in a Three-phase Induction Motor Model Core by Using a Small-sized Vector Hysteresis Sensor(<Special Issue>The 20th MAGDA Conference in Pacific Asia (MAGDA2011))

description.ja: In order to design high efficiency motors, it is very important to make clear detailed magnetic phenomena in constructed cores sufficiently. In this paper, the magnetic property distributions of local vector magnetic properties in a three-phase induction motor model core under a sinusoidal and PWM excitation were measured by using the vector hysteresis sensor (V-H sensor). The sensor has two sets of the needle probe and the double H-coil for measurements of the magnetic flux density B and the magnetic field strength H. In the measured result, each harmonic component of the magnetic property was calculated with the Fast Fourier Transform. In case of the PWM excitation, the iron loss due to the modulation frequency component increased. In this paper, the influence of the modulation frequency component depending on magnetic anisotropy phenomena was discussed in detail.

publication_name.ja: 日本AEM学会誌 = Journal of the Japan Society of Applied Electromagnetics

paper_title.ja: Magnetic Property Distribution in a Magnetic Circuit Model Core Measured with a Very Small Two-dimensional Vector Magnetic Sensor (特集 The 20th MAGDA Conference in Pacific Asia (MAGDA2011))
paper_title.en: Magnetic Property Distribution in a Magnetic Circuit Model Core Measured with a Very Small Two-dimensional Vector Magnetic Sensor(<Special Issue>The 20th MAGDA Conference in Pacific Asia (MAGDA2011))

description.ja: This paper presents a small-sized vector-hysteresis sensor (V-H sensor) consisting of a very small double H-coil and short distance B-needle probes. The magnetic flux density vector B and the field strength vector H are measured with the B-needle probes and the double H-coil, respectively. In order to evaluate the measurement accuracy of the B-needle probes, the distance between the needles was changed from 2 mm to 20 mm. The detailed two-dimensional vector magnetic properties of a magnetic model core made of grain-oriented electric steel sheets are investigated.

publication_name.ja: 日本AEM学会誌 = Journal of the Japan Society of Applied Electromagnetics

paper_title.ja: 高磁束密度下における方向性電磁鋼板の2次元磁気ひずみ(<特集>第23回「電磁力関連のダイナミクス」シンポジウム)
paper_title.en: Two-dimensional Magnetostriction of a Grain-oriented Electrical Steel Sheet under High Magnetic Flux Density Conditions(<Special Issue>the 23rd Symposium on Electromagnetics and Dynamics)

description.ja: Two-dimensional magnetostriction of a grain-oriented electrical steel sheet under high magnetic flux conditions is measured by means of a new method for evaluating magnetostriction phenomena in arbitrary direction. The direction of the principal strain didn't change at low magnetic flux conditions. However, under high magnetic flux conditions the direction of the principal strain was changed and the magnetostriction waveform was distorted. The maximum magnetostriction increased depending on the inclination angle for the rolling direction.

publication_name.ja: 日本AEM学会誌 = Journal of the Japan Society of Applied Electromagnetics

paper_title.ja: 渦電流収束効果を用いた連続経頭蓋磁気刺激用コイルの開発(<特集>第23回「電磁力関連のダイナミクス」シンポジウム)
paper_title.en: Development of transcranial magnetic stimulation coil by using the eddy current concentration method(<Special Issue>the 23rd Symposium on Electromagnetics and Dynamics)

ja.name: 大分県産業創造機構:大分大学

description.ja: This paper describes the coil for continuous pulse excitation. The coil for continuous pulse excitation is used transcranial magnetic stimulation (IMS). TMS is used for study of the human brain and for neurological therapeutics. The design of the magnetic stimulation coil is very important. The magnetic stimulation coil uses the eddy current concentrate method. This eddy current concentrate method is used by the control with eddy current. The eddy current control has a conducting plate that set to concentrate the eddy current and to decrease the exciting current. The eddy current density distribution of magnetic eight-figure coil and convergence eddy current coil were analyzed. We proposed the new design of the magnetic stimulation coil, and the distribution of the eddy current density are analyzed by the numeric simulations.

publication_name.ja: 日本AEM学会誌 = Journal of the Japan Society of Applied Electromagnetics

paper_title.ja: 応力印加時における任意磁束条件下のベクトル磁気特性(<特集>第23回「電磁力関連のダイナミクス」シンポジウム)
paper_title.en: Vector Magnetic Property under Arbitrary Magnetic Flux Conditions by applying Mechanical Stress(<Special Issue>the 23rd Symposium on Electromagnetics and Dynamics)

ja.name: 大分県産業創造機構:大分大学

description.ja: Electrical steel sheet in electrical machines is influenced strongly by external stress. In particular, the magnetic properties of the electrical steel sheets are deteriorated by mechanical stress during manufacturing process. In addition, the electrical steel in rotating machines is magnetized under alternating and rotating magnetic flux conditions. It is important to know the relationships between the magnetic properties and stress in order to utilize the electrical steel sheet efficiency. In this paper, we investigate the vector magnetic property under various magnetic flux conditions by applying the mechanical stress. From a result, it was obtained that the difference of the vector magnetic property at the parallel and transverse to the direction of the applied mechanical stress along the rolling direction.

publication_name.ja: 日本AEM学会誌 = Journal of the Japan Society of Applied Electromagnetics

paper_title.ja: 方向性電磁鋼板の結晶粒と局所2次元ベクトル磁気特性分布(<特集>第23回「電磁力関連のダイナミクス」シンポジウム)
paper_title.en: Local Two-dimensional Vector Magnetic Property Distribution of Grain-oriented Electric Steel Sheet and Its relation to Grains(<Special Issue>the 23rd Symposium on Electromagnetics and Dynamics)

ja.name: 大分大学:大分県産業創造機構

description.ja: This paper presents a small-sized vector-hysteresis sensor (V-H sensor), which has piercing B-needles to go through insulating coating of silicon steel sheets. The B-needle probe can break through the insulation coating of silicon steel sheets like a drill. The magnetic flux density vector B and the field strength vector H are measured with the B-needle probe and the double H-coil, respectively. The detailed two-dimensional vector magnetic property of the transformer model core of grain-oriented electric steel sheets with insulation coating and without insulation coating was investigated.

publication_name.ja: 日本AEM学会誌 = Journal of the Japan Society of Applied Electromagnetics

paper_title.ja: 磁束集束型表面永久磁石配列を用いた磁気歯車の研究(<特集>第23回「電磁力関連のダイナミクス」シンポジウム)
paper_title.en: Study on Magnetic Gears utilizing Concentration-type Surface Permanent Magnet Arrangement(<Special Issue>the 23rd Symposium on Electromagnetics and Dynamics)

description.ja: This paper presents results of two-dimensional magnetic field analysis of a surface permanent magnet type magnetic gear by using the finite element method, and the characteristic of the magnetic gear is clarified. A magnetic gear is a force transmitter consisting permanent magnets. The power can be transmitted torque through magnetic forces without contact. It is not worn out because there is no friction. However, the torque that can be transmitted is low. In order to improve transmission torque, we applied flux concentration-type permanent magnet arrangement to surface permanent magnet type magnetic gear. In this paper, influence of the concentration-type surface permanent magnet arrangement on the gap flux density distribution and transmission torque is investigated.

publication_name.ja: 日本AEM学会誌 = Journal of the Japan Society of Applied Electromagnetics

paper_title.ja: 複素近似ベクトル磁気特性を考慮した有限要素法による永久磁石モータの磁気特性解析(<特集>第23回「電磁力関連のダイナミクス」シンポジウム)
paper_title.en: Magnetic Characteristic Analysis of a Permanent Magnet Motor by using FEM Considering Complex-approximated Vector Magnetic Properties(<Special Issue>the 23rd Symposium on Electromagnetics and Dynamics)

description.ja: This paper deals with magnetic characteristic analysis of a permanent magnet motor by using the complex E&S modeling. The calculated results at loaded conditions are compared with ones of the conventional E&S modeling for verification. The conventional E&S modeling is accurate, but very time-consuming due to bad-convergence property. The developed complex E&S modeling has a good-convergence property and we can reduce calculation time considerably at the cost of accuracy. The applicability of the complex E&S modeling for iron loss evaluation of motor cores is investigated in this paper.

publication_name.ja: 日本AEM学会誌 = Journal of the Japan Society of Applied Electromagnetics

paper_title.ja: 回転液中紡糸法による細線磁石の作製と高保磁力化の検討(<特集>第23回「電磁力関連のダイナミクス」シンポジウム)
paper_title.en: Production of Thin Line Magnets by using In-rotating Liquid Spinning Method and Improvement of Their Coercive Force(<Special Issue>the 23rd Symposium on Electromagnetics and Dynamics)

description.ja: This paper deals with production of NdFeB thin line magnets by using in-rotating liquid spinning method and their magnetic properties. Because a small columnar permanent magnet can be easily obtained by cutting the thin line magnet, this production method is effective to reduce costs of such small-sized NdFeB magnets. The application of the special magnets is a magnetic guide wire, which can control its tip direction with outer magnetic field. In this paper, we also show investigated results to improve their coercive force.

publication_name.ja: 日本AEM学会誌 = Journal of the Japan Society of Applied Electromagnetics

paper_title.ja: 小型V-Hセンサを用いたPWM励磁下における三相誘導電動機モデルコア中のベクトル磁気特性分布の測定
